// Pivot 0, 0
int Left_Flipper_Long[28] = {
	0, 20,
	0, 6,
	5, 0,
	19, 0,
	31, 9,
	42, 17,
	53, 25,
	64, 37,
	64, 42,
	61, 45,
	53, 45,
	37, 37,
	22, 31,
	2, 23
};

// Pivot 0.000000, 0.000000
float Left_Flipper_Long[28] = {
	0.000000f, 0.444444f,
	0.000000f, 0.133333f,
	0.078125f, 0.000000f,
	0.296875f, 0.000000f,
	0.484375f, 0.200000f,
	0.656250f, 0.377778f,
	0.828125f, 0.555556f,
	1.000000f, 0.822222f,
	1.000000f, 0.933333f,
	0.953125f, 1.000000f,
	0.828125f, 1.000000f,
	0.578125f, 0.822222f,
